title: Staff Servers
description: Sister networks and servers created by members of LC's final staff team, around the time of LC's Shutdown.

title: Remake Servers
description: Servers created by LockedCraft players, attempting to emulate parts of LC.

title: Player Servers
description: Unrelated servers crated by LockedCraft's player base after LC's shutdown.

title: Suggested Servers
description: Unrelated servers, commonly visited by, but not in ownership of, members of LC's player base.
